name: OrthoRoute GPU Autorouter
description: GPU-accelerated PCB autorouter using CuPy and advanced algorithms
description_full: A high-performance PCB autorouter that leverages GPU acceleration via CuPy for massively parallel routing algorithms. Features real-time visual feedback, intelligent pathfinding, and seamless KiCad 9.0+ integration. No compiled binaries required - pure Python using KiCad IPC API.
